snippet: Tucker Carlson’s Daily Caller has quadrupled its page views and total audience in two years, and it announced that it became profitable this year.
abstract: Tucker Carlson’s conservative news site Daily Caller has quadrupled its page views and total audience in two years, and says it has become profitable in 2012; site does not want to be pigeonholed as political and is steadily adding different topical sections; Carlson says old-fashioned reporting is key.
lead_paragraph: Tucker Carlson’s Daily Caller has quadrupled its page views and total audience in two years, and it announced that it became profitable this year.

headline.seo: Tucker Carlson Angles for Daily Caller Clicks, Not Fights
headline.main: Still a Conservative Provocateur, Carlson Angles for Clicks, Not Fights
headline.print_headline: Still a Conservative Provocateur, Carlson Angles for Clicks, Not Fights
